description_for_human: AI powered automation toolkit which acts as an agent that discovers MCP servers for you. Point it at GitHub/npm/configure your own discovery, let GPT or Claude analyze the API or MCP or any tool, get ready-to-ship plugin configs. Zero manual work.
description_for_model: AI powered automation toolkit which acts as an agent that discovers MCP servers for you. Point it at GitHub/npm/configure your own discovery, let GPT or Claude analyze the API or MCP or any tool, get ready-to-ship plugin configs. Zero manual work.
